title: The Asus ROG Mothership is a Surface Pro for gamers
description: Asuss ROG Mothership is a massive 17-inch, 10 pound gaming laptop thats built like a Microsoft Surface, announced at CES 2019. But the Motherships unconventional design offers some pretty impressive gaming power, assuming youre willing to deal with the size.
